com.mlt.desktop.graphic

Class Render

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.desktop.graphic.Render

  • public class Render
extends java.lang.Object
    A render manages a list of drawings that have to be saved, restored or rendered in a given order.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
